TopicTitle: Anyone going to ESTEC today? (04-10-2015, Noordwijk, Netherlands)

Articles.Content:
Is anyone going to the open day at ESA/ESTEC in Noordwijk?

I'm going and I read in the devnotes that Kasper will be there too.

If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re visiting OpenESTEC this Sunday, you might unknowingly run into Kasper, who will be there to attend a few symposia and meet a few ESA staff. If you live in the Netherlands (or close by) and if youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re interested in spaceflight then this might just be something youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re interested in: lectures by astronauts, actual spacecraft and the research & technology centre of ESA will be open to the public.

Might be nice to meet some fellow KSP-ers. Unfortunately, the tickets are all sold out.

Of course I should have asked this a bit earlier..
